title: Bloomberg's Rye on Congressional Fight Over Zika Funding(Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Rye on Congressional Fight Over Zika Funding(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Brian Rye, Senior Health-Care Policy Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, on how the Olympic Zika threat could bite Congress during their summer recess.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
